start.title: Wahl-O-Mat
start.tagline: Find out which party's positions are closest to yours
start.step1: Answer the following theses with "Agree", "Neutral" or "Disagree"
start.step2: You can skip theses – they won't be included in the evaluation
start.step3: At the end you'll see how well your answers match each party's positions
start.disclaimer: The Wahl-O-Mat does not give voting recommendations. It serves political education and comparison of positions.
